name: The Drift Centre Table by Kelly Hoppen
description: The Drift Centre Table, a Kelly Hoppen and DAVIDSON masterpiece, combines tall grey ash legs with a pristine white lacquer top for refined sophistication. Its distinctive shape, chunky top, and geometric legs showcase precision craftsmanship. This table serves as a versatile centrepiece, perfect for grand entrances or small dining areas. With its cool geometric profile, the Drift Centre Table offers visual intrigue and refinement, embodying a unique blend of luxury and artistry.
